entries.description: Learn how to orient yourself in the data world. This video covers the definition of data science, data engineering, and data analytics.
entries.name: Introduction to the data professions

entries.description: Learn how to distinguish between areas of data science. This video covers data science, artificial intelligence, and deep learning.
entries.name: The four flavors of data analysis

entries.description: Learn how to justify your choice in using Python for data science. This video covers an introduction to Python, Python for analytics, and Python in big data.
entries.name: Why use Python for analytics?

entries.description: Get oriented with this course. This video covers a roadmap for data preparation, data visualization, and the math requirements for analytics.
entries.name: High-level course road map

entries.description: Learn how to filter and select. This video covers indexes, Series objects, and DataFrame objects.
entries.name: Filtering and selecting

entries.description: Learn how to treat missing values. This video covers dropping values, approximation, and filtering.
entries.name: Treating missing values

entries.description: Learn how to remove duplicates. This video covers dropping records with Pandas.
entries.name: Removing duplicates

entries.description: Learn how to concatenate and transform. This video covers combining data, converting data, and reformatting data.
entries.name: Concatenating and transforming

entries.description: Learn how to group and aggregate. This video covers subgrouping, describing subgroups, and data aggregation.
entries.name: Grouping and aggregation

entries.description: Learn how to identify three types of data visualization. This video covers data storytelling, data showcasing, and data art.
entries.name: The three types of data visualization

entries.description: Learn how to select optimal data graphics. This video covers graphics for storytelling, graphics for showcasing, and graphics for data art.
entries.name: Selecting optimal data graphics

entries.description: Learn how to communicate with color and context. This video covers color schemes, annotation, and visual context.
entries.name: Communicating with color and context

entries.description: Learn how to create standard data graphics. This video covers line charts, pie charts, and bar charts.
entries.name: Creating standard data graphics

entries.description: Learn how to define elements of a plot. This video covers object-oriented plotting, sub-plots, and axis labels.
entries.name: Defining elements of a plot

entries.description: Learn how to format plots. This video covers custom plot colors, line styles, and marker styles.
entries.name: Plot formatting

entries.description: Learn how to create labels and annotations. This video covers labeling pot features, legends, and annotating plot features.
entries.name: Creating labels and annotations

entries.description: Learn how to visualize time series. This video covers handling time series and plotting time series.
entries.name: Visualizing time series

entries.description: Learn how to create statistical data graphics. This video covers histograms, boxplots, and scatter plots.
entries.name: Creating statistical data graphics

entries.description: Learn how to perform simple arithmetic. This video covers standard arithmetic, arithmetic multiplication, and matrix multiplication.
entries.name: Simple arithmetic

entries.description: Learn how to perform different types of multiplication. This video covers the dot product and matrix multiplication.
entries.name: Basic linear algebra

entries.description: Learn how to generate summary statistics. This video covers descriptive statistics, describing values, and describing spread.
entries.name: Generating summary statistics

entries.description: Learn how to summarize categorical data. This video covers counts, variable description, and cross-tabulation.
entries.name: Summarizing categorical data

entries.description: Learn how to conduct parametric correlation analysis. This video covers linear correlation and causation.
entries.name: Parametric correlation analysis

entries.description: Learn how to conduct a non-parametric correlation analysis. This video covers categorical variables, Spearman rank correlation, and Chi-square tables.
entries.name: Non-parametric correlation analysis

entries.description: Learn how to transform dataset distributions. This video covers preparing data for machine learning, normalization, and standardization.
entries.name: Transforming dataset distributions

entries.description: Learn how to conduct extreme value analysis for outliers. This video covers point outliers, contextual outliers, and collective outliers.
entries.name: Extreme value analysis for outliers

entries.description: Learn how to conduct multivariate analysis for outliers. This video covers box plots and scatter plot matrices.
entries.name: Multivariate analysis for outliers

entries.description: Learn how to work with objects. This video covers the BeautifulSoup library, BeautifulSoup objects, and NavigableString objects.
entries.name: BeautifulSoup object

entries.description: Learn how to work with objects. This video covers the BeautifulSoup library, BeautifulSoup objects, and NavigableString objects.
entries.name: NavigableString objects

entries.description: Learn how to parse data. This video covers parsing data, getting data from a parse tree, and searching and retrieving data from a parse tree.
entries.name: Data parsing

entries.description: Learn how to scrape web data. This video covers reading and writing data from the internet.
entries.name: Web scraping in practice

entries.description: Learn how to get started with natural language processing. This video covers tokenizing, removing stop words, and word frequency counts.
entries.name: Introduction to NLP

entries.description: Learn how to create basic charts. This video covers Plotly line charts, bar charts, and pie charts.
entries.name: Introduction to Plotly

entries.description: Learn how to create statistical charts. This video covers Plotly histograms, boxplots, and scatter plots.
entries.name: Create statistical charts

entries.description: Learn how to create basic charts. This video covers the features of Plotly line charts.
entries.name: Line charts in Plotly

entries.description: Learn how to create basic charts. This video covers the features of Plotly bar charts and pie charts.
entries.name: Bar charts and pie charts in Plotly

entries.description: Learn how to create statistical charts. This video covers Plotly histograms, boxplots, and scatter plots.
entries.name: Create statistical charts
